main event: The UFO sighting occurred on 12 December 1954 at Foster AFB, Texas. It involved 2-3 unidentified objects making irregular movements at an altitude of approximately 50,000 ft.
interesting points: The observation involved ground-radar, air visual, and GCI ground-radar tracking.
The objects were described as oblong and/or round, with varying reports of size.
Witnesses reported seeing a metallic object with another suspended beneath it.
The objects were also identified as a weather balloon by some personnel, with conflicting opinions from different officers involved.
A T-33 aircraft was requested to attempt identification but was unable to perform interception, with one pilot suggesting the object appeared to be a balloon.
witnesses: Ground-Radar personnel, Air Visual personnel, GCI Ground-Radar personnel, T-33 aircraft pilot
